author: crithon

text: Stats update: This is the fifth song from the Pop'n Music franchise, which ties it with Super Mario 64.  Not the Mario franchise, not Mario Nintendo 64 games as a whole.  Just Mario 64.  By itself.  To be fair, Mario 64 has sold more copies than all of the Pop'n games combined.

author: Arch4321

text: This is a remix of Beyond the Bounds from Zone of the Enders 2, also in this list. Of course I'm used to the original, but I was pleasantly surprised by this remix. Which is not too surprising since I'm a big fan of Pop'n Music soundtracks.
author: SupraDarky
